Uses of Class
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.SpriteSheet.PackedSprite

Packages that use SpriteSheet.PackedSprite
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics   
 

Uses of SpriteSheet.PackedSprite in com.badlogic.gdx.graphics
 

Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.graphics that return SpriteSheet.PackedSprite
 SpriteSheet.PackedSprite SpriteSheet.get(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the first sprite found with the specified name.

This method uses string comparison to find the sprite, so the result should be cached rather than calling this method every frame.
 

Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.graphics that return types with arguments of type SpriteSheet.PackedSprite
 java.util.List<SpriteSheet.PackedSprite> SpriteSheet.getAll(java.lang.String name)
          Returns all sprites found with the specified name, ordered by smallest to largest index.

This method uses string comparison to find the sprite, so the result should be cached rather than calling this method every frame.
